translation.GET_SKINS_AS_GOLD_INFO: EasyTrade.bet delivers the won skins in the form of gold in Standoff 2 until the trading update appears! (We take over the marketplace fee!)
translation.You didn't set a Standoff 2 ID: Вы не установили Standoff2 ID в своем профиле
translation.Some mobile browsers don't allow direct: Некоторые мобильные браузеры блокируют прямую загрузку. Есть один способ: попробуйте нажать на изображение и удерживайте палец, как если бы хотели скачать картинку с другого сайта
translation.Download this generated picture and use: Скачайте эту сгенерированную картинку и спользуйте в качестве аватара в своём Standoff 2 account
translation.Now, sell a skin (worth at least x-facto: Теперь скин (стоящий как минимум х) на маркете.
translation.Finally, take a screenshot of the market: Сделайте скриншот выложенного скина и залейте его сюда
translation.Wait until you get notified and a staff: Готово! Скоро вы получите уведмоление о том, что наш представитель перечислил вам золото
translation.FAQ_Hey, what can I help you with?: Hey, what can I help you with?
translation.FAQ_Okay, what do you want to know?: Okay, what do you want to know?
translation.FAQ_You can purchase Coins. Just use the: You can purchase Coins. Just use the green button on the right top.
translation.FAQ_No, we are not a casino site. Money: No, we are not a casino site. Money can not be paid out of the balance. Only the won skins can be paid out.
translation.FAQ_Please use our form to contact a hum: Please use our form to contact a human:
translation.FAQ_How can I get my skins transfered to: How can I get my skins transfered to my Standoff 2 account?
translation.FAQ_How can I be sure that I get my skin: How can I be sure that I get my skins?
translation.FAQ_The staff member asked me for skins/: The staff member asked me for skins/gold?
translation.FAQ_We have a hard working, trustful sta: We have a hard working, trustful staff team. After you requested your skin in your inventory one of the staffs will transfer the skin to your account via trading. You will receive a code to proof your identity. The staff member will send you a direct message in Standoff 2 and you will need to enter the code. After that you will get a trade offer.
translation.FAQ_We are an officially registered comp: We are an officially registered company based in Germany. We will give our best to satisfy you! That includes a strong trust factor between our customers.
translation.FAQ_Our staff team would never ask for a: Our staff team would never ask for any personal information or skins. Our staff team will only send you a verification message and nothing more. After that you will need to accept the trader offer in order to get the skins.
translation.Find out more information about our prov: Find out more information about our provably fair on this page:
